segments.text: Why do you think you are qualified for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have four years study in the Department of Mechanical Engineering and it has given me a solid theory foundation . Moreover , I have worked at CAB Company for 4 years and got a lot of practical experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Then what's your technical post title now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a senior mechanical design engineer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you take the original certificate with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you briefly tell me about one of your designs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , I designed a more powerful gasoline engine , which greatly increased the speed of limousines .
segments.speaker: S2
